message: Let's be fair and take the biggest share as I am the one making the offer.
My turn to propose.  Let's split a bit more evenly, but time is money - take it while it's good!
You didn't take my first offer, and now my share is worth less. I'll give you a bit less this time.
Alice, let's be realistic. This offer is fair and we both lose if this drags on. Make a smart choice.
I know we both lose if this drags on, but I'm not ready to give up yet. This is my best offer so far.
Alice, this is as close as it's going to get.  Accept this offer, or we both walk away with nothing.  The clock is ticking!
